ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Female Slaves
ygData.msgSnippet: ... blue dress, cos they wear the noob clothes, but havnt even seen any male high elf either. ... Ohh. Ok. I thought you meant like wearing a dark blue robe or
ygData.messageBody:
> thanks, i already looked up the quest, but all high female slaves are in
blue dress, cos they wear the noob clothes, but havnt even seen any male
high elf either.
> damn things wont spawn.
>
Ohh. Ok. I thought you meant like wearing a dark blue robe or something.
wrong mental image. Ok. So you wanted a pretty much "naked" regular one.
Yeah, sometimes they are hard to spawn. Either find a way to get the orcs to
kill a slave OR give keys to get them to leave and one will eventually
spawn.
>
> can anyone recommend a better robe for a level 14 mage, havnt got any
money so buying of another player isnt really an option (besides i think
buying stuff off other players defies the point of the game)
>
> Thanks.
>
http://everquest.allakhazam.com/db/adv_search.html?stn=robe
Look up info on all of the ones in your lvl range. Might help. :-)
Also try a search for gown or something like that.
luv,
-Su
